text: William Lauder may refer to: *William de Lauder (1380–1425), bishop of Glasgow *William Lauder (poet) (1520?-1573), poet *William Lauder (forger) (died 1771), forger *William P. Lauder (born 1960), president and CEO of the Estée Lauder Companies Inc. *William Lauder (priest) (died 1868), Anglican dean *William Preston Lauder (1788–1850), Scottish physician *William Waugh Lauder (1858–1931), Canadian pianist, music critic and lecturer
title: William Lauder
